label: Violation Date
desc: Date of the traffic violation.违章发生日期

label: Violation Time
desc: Time of the traffic violation.违章发生时间

label: Agency
desc: Agency issuing the traffic violation. (Example: MCP is Montgomery County Police)违章处理警局

label: Court Code
desc: Court code representing the district of assignment of the officer. R15 = 1st district, Rockville B15 = 2nd district, Bethesda SS15 = 3rd district, Silver Spring WG15 = 4th district, Wheaton G15 = 5th district, Germantown M15 = 6th district, Gaithersburg / Montgomery Village HQ15 = Headquarters and Special Operations违章具体处理派出所？

label: Charge Description
desc: Text description of the specific charge.违章的具体描述

label: Violation Location
desc: Location of the violation, usually an address or intersection.违章的位置

label: Latitude
desc: Latitude location of the traffic violation.违章位置的纬度

label: Longitude
desc: Longitude location of the traffic violation.违章位置的经度

label: Accident Involved
desc: If traffic violation involved an accident.是否引发事故

label: Seat Belt Violation
desc: If traffic violation involved a seat belt violation.是否涉及到安全带的使用

label: Personal Injury
desc: If traffic violation involved Personal Injury.是否有人员受伤

label: Property Damage
desc: If traffic violation involved Property Damage.是痘有财产损失

label: Fatality
desc: If traffic violation involved a fatality.是否有人员死亡

label: Commercial License
desc: If the vehicle committing the traffic violation used Commercial License是否为公司牌照

label: Hazardous Materials
desc: If the traffic violation involved hazardous materials.事故中是否涉及危险品

label: Commercial Vehicle
desc: If the vehicle committing the traffic violation is a commercial vehicle.违章车辆是否为商务车

label: Alcohol Related
desc: If the traffic violation included an alcohol related是否涉及酒驾

label: Work Zone
desc: If the traffic violation was in a work zone.违章是否发生在工作区

label: Vehicle Registration State
desc: State issuing the vehicle registration.是否为国家牌照的公务车

label: Vehicle Type
desc: Type of vehicle (Examples: Automobile, Station Wagon, Heavy Duty Truck, etc.)车型

label: Vehicle Year
desc: Year vehicle was made.车辆出厂日期

label: Vehicle Manufacturer
desc: Manufacturer of the vehicle (Examples: Ford, Chevy, Honda, Toyota, etc.)车辆品牌

label: Vehicle Model
desc: Model of the vehicle.车的颜色

label: Vehicle Color
desc: Color of the vehicle.违章类型

label: Violation Type
desc: Violation type. (Examples: Warning, Citation, SERO ie SAFETY EQUIPMENT REPAIR ORDERS)违章类型

label: Charge Code
desc: Numeric code for the specific charge.罚款代码

label: State Law Article
desc: Article of State Law. (TA = Transportation Article, MR = Maryland Rules)触犯条例的级别（国家级或是州级）

label: Contributing Factor
desc: If the traffic violation was a contributing factor in an accident.这次违章是否是导致事故发生的原因

label: Driver Race
desc: Race of the driver. (Example: Asian, Black, White, Other, etc.)司机种族

label: Driver Gender
desc: Gender of the driver (F = Female, M = Male)司机性别

label: Driver City
desc: City of the driver’s home address.司机家庭住址的城市

label: Driver State
desc: State of the driver’s home address.司机家庭住址的州

label: Driver License State
desc: State issuing the Driver’s License.（颁发驾照的州）

label: Arrest Type
desc: Type of Arrest (A = Marked, B = Unmarked, etc.)是否被逮捕

label: Geo-coded Location
desc: Geo-coded location information.位置区域码，类似于中国的邮编。
